commit.message:
stl_threads.h (struct _STL_mutex_lock): Same.


2001-02-03  Benjamin Kosnik  <bkoz@redhat.com>

	* include/bits/stl_threads.h (struct _STL_mutex_lock): Same.
	* include/bits/localefwd.h: More initialization cleanups.
